S.FORM: kakiliman Ayma a tademaw u timulay nu amilika antis atu altipulanu aitidaay a binacadan u tademaw nuheni malakuwit ku tusalasubu aemang ku aymala a tademaw nikaudip i puliwiya, milu, celi, itidanamin i niyadu maluk ku nikaudip. yu 15 a siki nu inciya atademaw nuayawan 16 a siki u sipanya ku sitatudungay itawya, itini i timulan nu amilika maudip pina tu a siki. paluma, pahabay tu katalan ucacanan atu mibuting usakaudip nu henisa nikaalaan. 2 , . 15 16 . , . likisi umikingkiway palutatenga tu ayma a tademaw nu kakawsan sa nanu enem a emang tu tusaaemang a mihcaan namakayni i yacu mabulaw tayni, sayaway napapikanay tu sidi' ku nikaudip, 6 2 . yu pulug nu mihcaan sepat amalebut a mihcaan u kakawsa mipaayaw tu paluma tu cacanan, duma a tademaw malingatu i keke hananay tepal nu sauwac kuluma. 4000 . pulung numihcaan enem a lasubu sa, idaw ku tusaay a emang i alputilanu a buyu'an mueneng. Tiyawanake nanu tawya a patideng. nika, pulung nu mihcaan cacay amalebut katukuh cacaymalebut idaw ku cacay a lasubu a mihcaan, ina niyadu masubelit sipibakah, sakamu sa ku mikiung kikiway namakedal itinasa . 600 2 . . 1000 1100 .Eagan, 12 13. nilacilam 15 a sikinuteban, aymala atademaw atu liwliw nu niyadu' mapatungus nu inciya a tademaw . 15 . Aymala a tademaw pacicihan tu pasayda i inciya a padamsu, tu sipanya atademaw misawacu micumud, kiyu inciya a kanatal maala. U sipanya hat uku mikuwanay idaw t uku baluhay a hulic, sakatuud sa kunipalaklak tu mi sindingay tu tinsukiw. . .Eagan, 15.1532 . . baluhay a tayniay u maedesay sakay binawlan misabana' tu aymala a tademaw , mialaw tu umah' nu intian, mialaw aca tu kel a kitidaan kakutkutan tu baba'tuwan, u aymala a tademaw sabana han papikutkut tu baba'tuwan, capapihanhan cayay panademiadan . . . i 1781 a mihcaan, aymala a sinin ci tupuka.katali.lapas mukelid tu intian atademaw palekal midademec , pecien naming nu heni ku kiwkay atu kitidaan nu siyhu, Eagan, 16 17.1781 . katukuh i 19 a siki, ubalucu' nu binawlan midademec tu maedesay madangkic ku heni amubelin tu mahidaay a siyhu, u celi 1818 a mihcaan uheni patideng tu kanatal, u puluwiya,milu a kanatal makakilul naming patideng tu kanatal nu heni, makakilunamin atu puliwal mukelid malpacaw kiyu misiteked. 19 1818 . , . hidasa, aymala atademaw mapahengad nu salengacay a tademaw u kawaw nuheni caay kasumad. Katukuh 20 a siki nuteban paculuay sidubu tu amilpacaw hinapaculi tu, sawsawni masasuada tu, 20 a siki nudikuda tu, aymala a tademaw i tini usapikuwan tu sakaudip nu binawlan maniket tu kuheni, uduma ci ukekatenase namala sakatusaay a puluwiya a hucungtung. . 20 .20 .Eagan, 19. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan
